name: Cycle Rickshaw SIM 3D
description:
Cycle Rickshaw SIM 3D is based on a life event or ricky, the super ching racer who is famous for tactful hill driving strategy. Start your rickshaw simulator on the service road before picking people from hill stations. Your three wheel super car cycle rickshaw is an open drive with mountainous regions and deep valleys.
Feautres:

- Detailed high quality small town environment
- Cycle pedal animations of rickshaw driver
- Bicycle Rickshaw driving in beautiful mountains
- Local people transport & tourist transport
- Amazing controls and cycle bell
